channel.title: Help with making inf hp ring
channel.description:
me and my friend (Co-owner of thepwnage scape) were talking about making a inf hp ring but i told him i dont know how is there a way i can do that please put alot of Details cuse im still a noob at this its a (317)
Please&thank you
sincerely,Codypwns

item.title: Help with making inf hp ring
item.dc:creator: @codypwns codypwns
item.description:
@codypwns wrote:

Thx and sorry for my trouble still a noob you got a AIM (Aol Instant Messenger?)

Read full topic

item.title: Help with making inf hp ring
item.dc:creator: @antcolony3 antcolony3
item.description:
@antcolony3 wrote:

hehe i think i can help again codY!!! Well i know it can boots ur Equipment stats. And you can edit the character file, so i think this might be solveable. I would code like a strength pot or something. I THINKI GOTSOMETIHNG!!!
i don’t know the beginning part.
ENGLISHTRANSLATION: the part I don’t know = if i wield this item …
English Translation: the part I do know = this will happen.
I’ll still give you the part where it raises ur hp level when you wield

addSkillXP((1400000000*playerLevel[3]), 3);

that means that whatever you did gave u at least lvl 99 hp :P.
Ok wielding - i’m guessing so this probably wont work
if(playerWieldsItem(the item number)) then

addSkillXP((1400000000*playerLevel[3]), 3);

I know thats not excactly what you needed…but i hope it gave u agood idea

Read full topic
item.source: Help with making inf hp ring
